verses.text: The mighty God, \add even\add* the \sc Lord\sc*, hath spoken, and called the earth From the rising of the sun unto the going down thereof.
Out of Zion, the perfection of beauty, God hath shined.
Our God shall come, and shall not keep silence: A fire shall devour before him, And it shall be very tempestuous round about him.
He shall call to the heavens from above, And to the earth, that \add he\add* may judge his people.
Gather my saints together unto me; Those that have made a covenant with me by sacrifice.
And the heavens shall declare his righteousness: For God \add is\add* judge himself. Selah.
Hear, O my people, and I will speak; O Israel, and I will testify against thee: I \add am\add* God, \add even\add* thy God.
I will not reprove thee for thy sacrifices Or thy burnt offerings, \add to have been\add* continually before me.
I will take no bullock out of thy house, \add Nor\add* he goats out of thy folds.
For every beast of the forest \add is\add* mine, \add And\add* the cattle upon a thousand hills.
I know all the fowls of the mountains: And the wild beasts of the field \add are\add* mine.
If I were hungry, I would not tell thee: For the world \add is\add* mine, and the fulness thereof.
Will I eat the flesh of bulls, Or drink the blood of goats?
Offer unto God thanksgiving; And pay thy vows unto the most High:
And call upon me in the day of trouble: I will deliver thee, and thou shalt glorify me.
But unto the wicked God saith, What hast thou to do to declare my statutes, Or \add that\add* thou shouldest take my covenant in thy mouth?
Seeing thou hatest instruction, And castest my words behind thee.
When thou sawest a thief, then thou consentedst with him, And hast been partaker with adulterers.
Thou givest thy mouth to evil, And thy tongue frameth deceit.
Thou sittest \add and\add* speakest against thy brother; Thou slanderest thine own motherâ€™s son.

These \add things\add* hast thou done, and I kept silence; Thou thoughtest that I was altogether \add such a one\add* as thyself: \add But\add* I will reprove thee, and set \add them\add* in order before thine eyes.
Now consider this, ye that forget God, Lest I tear \add you\add* in pieces, and \add there be\add* none to deliver.
Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: And to him that ordereth \add his\add* conversation \add aright\add* Will I shew the salvation of God.
